text: Mohalla Sadiqabad () is a small neighbourhood in Mansar Town of Attock District in Punjab, Pakistan. Mohalla Sadiqabad is at a distance of about 200 metres (650 feet) north of the famous Grand Trunk Road. It is located in the start of village Mansar while going to Mansar from Haji Shah or from Grand Trunk Road. A small Masjid is also present in Mohalla Sadiqabad. ==References== Category:Populated places in Attock District
title: Mohalla Sadiqabad
